definition[0]: when someone is removed from their job
example[0]: Wilson was claiming compensation for unfair dismissal.
example[1]: No dismissals have been announced yet.
definition[1]: when someone decides or says that something is not important, serious, or true
example[2]: Gill’s dismissal of the book as ‘386 pages of rubbish’
definition[2]: a decision by a judge to stop a court case
definition[3]: when someone is removed from their job by their employer
example[3]: The 11 employees would face disciplinary action, ranging from reprimand to suspension or dismissal.
example[4]: There will not be any dismissals of teachers.
